"All Special Ability Transfer":
"The Item Lab's \"All Special Ability Transfer\" function allows you to transfer all Special Abilities from one piece of equipment to another.

※Requires N-Special Ability Transfer Pass, N-Meseta, and a Material Item.
※A Material Item is any weapon/armor whose Special Ability Slot count is the same as, or lower than, the Base Item's."

"When performing a Transfer, all of the Base Item's Special Abilities will be replaced with the Material Item's Special Abilities, and the Material Item's Special Abilities will be lost.

※Some items, such as the Eredim series, do not require the use of an N-Special Ability Transfer Pass when used as a Material Item."
